english_example_sentence: If we stayed in the old house, we would be happier with our family.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы остались в старом доме, мы были бы счастливее с нашей семьей.
turkish_example_sentence: Eski evde kalsak, ailemizle daha mutlu oluruz.
